19: וַתְּחַלֶּלְ֨נָה <sup>2490 </sup> <n>And will ye pollute</n> אֹתִ֜י <sup>853 </sup> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> עַמִּ֗י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>me among my people</n> בְּשַׁעֲלֵ֣י <sup>8168 </sup> <n>for handfuls</n> שְׂעֹרִים֮ <sup>8184 </sup> <n>of barley</n> וּבִפְת֣וֹתֵי <sup>6595 </sup> <n>and for pieces</n> לֶחֶם֒ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>of bread</n> לְהָמִ֤ית <sup>4191 </sup> <n>to slay</n> נְפָשׁוֹת֙ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>the souls</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תְמוּתֶ֔נָה <sup>4191 </sup> <n>that should not die</n> וּלְחַיּ֥וֹת <sup>2421 </sup> <n>alive</n> נְפָשׁ֖וֹת <sup>5315 </sup> <n>the souls</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִֽחְיֶ֑ינָה <sup>2421 </sup> <n>that should not live</n> בְּכַ֨זֶּבְכֶ֔ם <sup>3576 </sup> <n>by your lying</n> לְעַמִּ֖י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>to my people</n> שֹׁמְעֵ֥י <sup>8085 </sup> <n>that hear</n> כָזָֽב׃ <sup>3577 </sup> <n>deceitful</n> ס
20: לָכֵ֞ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> כֹּה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אָמַ֣ר ׀ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Wherefore thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֗ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> הִנְנִ֤י <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>I am against</n> כִּסְּתוֹתֵיכֶ֙נָה֙ <sup>3704 </sup> <n>Behold I [am] against your pillows</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אַ֠תֵּנָה <sup>859 </sup> <n>wherewith ye</n> מְצֹדְד֨וֹת <sup>6679 </sup> <n>there hunt</n> שָׁ֤ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַנְּפָשׁוֹת֙ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>the souls</n> לְפֹ֣רְח֔וֹת <sup>6524 </sup> <n>to make [them] fly</n> וְקָרַעְתִּ֣י <sup>7167 </sup> <n>and I will tear</n> אֹתָ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> מֵעַ֖ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>from</n> זְרוֹעֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>2220 </sup> <n>them from your arms</n> וְשִׁלַּחְתִּי֙ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>go</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַנְּפָשׁ֔וֹת <sup>5315 </sup> <n>and will let the souls</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> אַתֶּ֛ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> מְצֹדְד֥וֹת <sup>6679 </sup> <n>that ye hunt</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נְפָשִׁ֖ים <sup>5315 </sup> <n>[even] the souls</n> לְפֹרְחֹֽת׃ <sup>6524 </sup> <n>to make [them] fly</n>
21: וְקָרַעְתִּ֞י <sup>7167 </sup> <n>also will I tear</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מִסְפְּחֹֽתֵיכֶ֗ם <sup>4555 </sup> <n>Your kerchiefs</n> וְהִצַּלְתִּ֤י <sup>5337 </sup> <n>and deliver</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַמִּי֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>my people</n> מִיֶּדְכֶ֔ן <sup>3027 </sup> <n>out of your hand</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will no</n> יִהְי֥וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> ע֛וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n> בְּיֶדְכֶ֖ן <sup>3027 </sup> <n>and they shall be no more in your hand</n> לִמְצוּדָ֑ה <sup>4686 </sup> <n>to be hunted</n> וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ן <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and ye shall know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I [am] the LORD</n>
22: יַ֣עַן <sup>3282 </sup> <n>Because</n> הַכְא֤וֹת <sup>3512 </sup> <n>sad</n> לֵב־ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>ye have made the heart</n> צַדִּיק֙ <sup>6662 </sup> <n>of the righteous</n> שֶׁ֔קֶר <sup>8267 </sup> <n>Because with lies</n> וַאֲנִ֖י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> הִכְאַבְתִּ֑יו <sup>3510 </sup> <n>whom I have not made sad</n> וּלְחַזֵּק֙ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>and strengthened</n> יְדֵ֣י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>the hands</n> רָשָׁ֔ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> לְבִלְתִּי־ <sup>1115 </sup> <n>not</n> שׁ֛וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>that he should not return</n> מִדַּרְכּ֥וֹ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>way</n> הָרָ֖ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>from his wicked</n> לְהַחֲיֹתֽוֹ׃ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>by promising him life</n>
23: לָכֵ֗ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>therefore</n> שָׁ֚וְא <sup>7723 </sup> <n>no more vanity</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will no</n> תֶחֱזֶ֔ינָה <sup>2372 </sup> <n>Therefore ye shall see</n> וְקֶ֖סֶם <sup>7081 </sup> <n>divinations</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will no</n> תִקְסַ֣מְנָה <sup>7080 </sup> <n>nor divine</n> ע֑וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n> וְהִצַּלְתִּ֤י <sup>5337 </sup> <n>for I will deliver</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַמִּי֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>my people</n> מִיֶּדְכֶ֔ן <sup>3027 </sup> <n>out of your hand</n> וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ן <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and ye shall know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I [am] the LORD</n>
